review: With prime this is a must have. TV shows and movies for everyone in the entire family. Ability to access apps and games and allows you to rent, buy or watch (with prime) in either SD or HD. Combined with prime and another kindle tablet this little box is a power house. Also this is the first complete success with voice command. I have found it to be 100% accurate when searching with voice command, something that really shocked me.

review: This device is a bandwidth hog! I can say with absolute certainty that the Amazon Fire TV is a data hog because its use is the only change I made to my internet usage in the last few months. My usage went from 264.7 gbs of data in a month in December to 625 gbs of data in January, after we received our Fire TVs. For many this is not significant, but we have a data cap of 400 gbs and our Fire TVs are eating through all of our data and then some. I paid an extra $70 last month because data went up to 800gbs! What the what?! I thought it might be a change in usage, and grilled my children about their TV viewing, gaming and YouTube usage for the past four months and it has not changed significantly. All in all, Amazon owes me about 100 dollars in overage fees from my ISP because of their wonky product. Buyer beware if you have a data cap!!
author: Brandy C. Carter "amazoniac"
